name: It only takes one
description:
A game about how peoples actions make you feel.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to try to get through your day.

Inspired by loneliness

Music
"Crossing the Chasm" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Despair and Triumph" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
